example.eg: Laura got a big inheritance from her father when he passed away.
example.egtrans: 劳拉的父亲过世后，她继承了一大笔财产。

example.eg: His tribal language was John's only inheritance from his native American ancestors.
example.egtrans: 部落语言是约翰从自己美洲土著祖先处继承来的唯一文化遗产。

example.eg: The crown was the prince's rightful inheritance.
example.egtrans: 国王这个位置是王子应该承袭的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 承袭头衔，承袭, 继承产业

example.eg: Pam decided that her business was the inheritance of her eldest son, who took care of her when she was old.
example.egtrans: 帕姆年老的时候，是自己的长子细心照顾，所以她决定，自己产业的继承权应该归长子。

example.eg: Inheritance is a tricky business, so some people leave all their things to charity to avoid causing family feuds.
example.egtrans: 遗产继承是件棘手事，也因此，许多人将他们的财产留给慈善机构，来避免导致家庭纷争。
